<html><head></head><body bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><div>Straightshot scratches behind an ear.</div><div><br></div><div>" That's a good question.  Maybe we should present a very small amount of it to them and see how they take to it."<br><br>Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media.  <div><br></div><div>I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  </div><div><br></div><div>Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address and we will talk.  </div></div><div><br>On Jul 19, 2012, at 5:57 PM, "C" <<a href="mailto:airly2002@...">airly2002@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type="cite"><div>














<span style="display:none"> </span>



    <div id="ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>Talon:<br>
<br>
Talon smiled, she didnt expected that her babies got so much attention and care. She ate a bit of the remained fish, she looked a little tired. The babies were deeply sleeping and purring. <br>
<br>
"Do you think that they can eat energon as us?" said Talon to Straightshot "Or do we have to feed them with organig food?"<br>
<br>
--- In <a href="mailto:nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com</a>, Sandra Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:<br>
><br>
> Straightshot covers them gently with a bed of nesting material, to keep the babies warm.<br>
> <br>
> " Great job Uproar, they'll sleep for a few hours now.  But they're gonna need more food when they wake up."<br>
> <br>
> Uproar nods.<br>
> <br>
> " No problem, I'll just go back ta the water and get another fish.  Or maybe find something else..  I did notice a surplus of wild Hogs running around, dozens of Em .  I think it's okay if I snag one once in a while.  Actually, this is when they feed so I better go out there now and get one."<br>
> <br>
> He trots off to bring more food back for Talon and the babies.<br>
> Straightshot waves to him.<br>
> <br>
> " Aw, he's really into helping you, Talon.  Look how big that fish was.  I bet he really worked hard ta bring it here.   I'm telling Tucson that Uncle Uproar is doing a fantastic job as food finder.  There, the babies are asleep now.  Hopefully Tucson will be back with the others shortly."<br>
> <br>
